result.arabic_text: إِنَّ هَٰٓؤُلَآءِ يُحِبُّونَ ٱلۡعَاجِلَةَ وَيَذَرُونَ وَرَآءَهُمۡ يَوۡمٗا ثَقِيلٗا
result.translation: (27) Indeed, these [disbelievers] love the immediate and leave behind them[1814] a grave Day.
result.footnotes: [1814]- i.e., neglect.  The meaning may also be "leave ahead of them."
